Class Applicant

java.lang.Object
BTO_Management_System.User
BTO_Management_System.Applicant
Direct Known Subclasses:
HDBOfficer
public class Applicant extends User
Represents an applicant in the BTO management system. Applicants can browse available projects, apply for projects they are eligible for, view the status of their application, submit enquiries about projects, view their submitted enquiries and any replies, and request to withdraw their application.

  • Field Details

    • application

      protected Application application
      The current application submitted by this applicant. This can be null if the applicant has not applied or their application has been withdrawn.

  • Constructor Details

    • Applicant

      public Applicant(String name, String nric, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus)
      Constructs a new Applicant with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - The full name of the applicant.
      nric - The National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) of the applicant.
      age - The current age of the applicant.
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the applicant (e.g., SINGLE, MARRIED).

  • Method Details

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      Returns the role of the user, which is "Applicant" for this class.
      Specified by:
      getRole in class User
      Returns:
      A String representing the user's role.

    • getEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiries()
      Retrieves the list of enquiries submitted by this applicant.
      Returns:
      A List of Enquiry objects.

    • isEligibleToApply

      protected boolean isEligibleToApply(BTOProject project)
      Checks if the applicant is eligible to apply for a given BTO project based on their age and marital status, and the flat types offered by the project.
      Parameters:
      project - The BTOProject to check eligibility for.
      Returns:
      true if the applicant is eligible, false otherwise.

    • viewAvailableProjects

      public void viewAvailableProjects()
      Displays the list of BTO projects that are currently available and for which the applicant is eligible. If no projects are available, a corresponding message is shown.

    • apply

      public void apply(BTO_Management_System.ProjectViewable project, FlatType flatType)
      Applies for a specified project with a chosen flat type. Eligibility checks are performed before creating and submitting the application.
      Parameters:
      project - The ProjectViewable object representing the BTO project to apply for.
      flatType - The desired flat type for the application.

    • viewAppliedProject

      public void viewAppliedProject()
      Displays the details of the project for which the applicant has currently applied. If the applicant has not applied for any project, a corresponding message is shown.

    • viewApplicationStatus

      public void viewApplicationStatus()
      Displays the current status of the applicant's application. If the applicant has not applied for any project, a corresponding message is shown.

    • requestWithdrawApplication

      public void requestWithdrawApplication()
      Allows the applicant to request a withdrawal of their current application, provided the application has not already been booked or a withdrawal request is pending.

    • submitEnquiry

      public void submitEnquiry(BTO_Management_System.ProjectViewable project, String enquiryText)
      Submits a new enquiry about a specified project. The enquiry is associated with the applicant and the project, and is added to both the applicant's list of enquiries and the project's list of enquiries.
      Parameters:
      project - The ProjectViewable object representing the BTO project the enquiry is about.
      enquiryText - The text content of the enquiry.

    • findEnquiryById

      public Enquiry findEnquiryById(int enquiryId)
      Finds an enquiry submitted by this applicant based on its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to find.
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object if found, otherwise null.

    • showAllEnquiries

      public void showAllEnquiries()
      Displays a list of all enquiries submitted by this applicant, showing their details.

    • viewEnquiry

      public void viewEnquiry(int enquiryId)
      Views the details of a specific enquiry submitted by this applicant, including any reply from an officer.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to view.

    • handleViewAvailableProjects

      public void handleViewAvailableProjects(Scanner scanner)
      Handles the display of available BTO projects to the applicant, including options for filtering by location and flat type, and sorting the results. It interacts with the user through the Scanner.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object to read user input for filtering and sorting options.

    • handleViewApplicationStatus

      public void handleViewApplicationStatus()
      Handles the display of the applicant's current application status.

    • handleViewAppliedProject

      public void handleViewAppliedProject()
      Handles the display of the details of the project the applicant has applied for.

    • handleApplyForProject

      public void handleApplyForProject(Scanner scanner)
      Handles the process of applying for a BTO project. It displays available projects, prompts the applicant to select a project and a flat type, and then submits the application.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object to read user input.

    • handleSubmitEnquiry

      public void handleSubmitEnquiry(Scanner scanner)
      Handles the submission of a new enquiry by the applicant for a specific project. Prompts the user for the project name and the enquiry text.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object to read user input.

    • handleManageEnquiries

      public void handleManageEnquiries(Scanner scanner)
      Handles the management of the applicant's enquiries, providing options to edit, delete, and view replies to their enquiries.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object to read user input for the management options.

    • handleRequestWithdrawal

      public void handleRequestWithdrawal(Scanner scanner)
      Handles the process of requesting a withdrawal of the applicant's current application. Prompts the user for confirmation before submitting the withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object to read user input for confirmation.
